html: (1 Nephi 21:1)."Listen, O isles … and hearken, ye people, from far." Scattered Israel can be found throughout the earth. An isle of the sea could be any place reachable over water. For example, the family of Lehi and Sariah was led to the ancient Americas, which they considered to be "an isle of the sea." (2 Nephi 10:20.)
